mapper.select: select * from gathering g left join view_gathering v on g.gathering_id = v.gathering_id where g.delete_yn != 1

select * from gathering
gathering_title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
gathering_description like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select * from view_gathering_manager v where v.members_id = #{membersId} and v.gathering_state = 2 and v.delete_yn = 0
select * from view_gathering_manager v where v.members_id = #{membersId} and v.gathering_state in (-1, 0, 1)
select sum(participate) as total_participate from view_gathering
select sum(gathering_headcount) as total_headCount from gathering
select * from gathering where gathering_type = #{type} and delete_yn = 0
mapper.insert: insert into gathering(gathering_title, members_id, gathering_datetime, gathering_description, gathering_headcount, gathering_address, gathering_type) values (#{title}, #{membersId}, #{dateTime}, #{description}, #{headCount}, #{address}, #{type})
insert into gathering_members(gathering_id, members_id, gathering_state) values(#{gatheringId}, #{membersId}, 0)
mapper.update: update gathering set gathering_title = #{title}, gathering_datetime = #{dateTime}, gathering_address = #{address}, gathering_description = #{description}, gathering_type = #{type}, gathering_headcount = #{headCount}, update_date = now() where gathering_id = #{gatheringId}
update gathering g set delete_yn = true, update_date = now() where gathering_id = #{gatheringId}
update gathering_members gm set gathering_state = 3 where gathering_id = #{gatheringId}
